page.name: Sky Pirate Blades
page.description: <no description available>

page.name: Dragonborn Thunder Scimitar I
page.description: A stolen scimitar that once belonged to one of Volgritian's great treasure hordes. Enchanted with dravir magic, each swing of this blade brings with it the fury of the skies.

page.name: Kaiju Rapier I
page.description: This rapier was carved from the bones of a long dead sea monster, trawled up from the depths of the ocean. It seems to glow with dormant power.
